Covenant.tooltip: Doubles the stats of all active Demon's Altars

Embalming.tooltip: Enemies killed have a 10% chance to be summoned back to life as allies.

Evil Pact.tooltip: Doubles the maximum quantity of imps summoned per battle.

Fireworks.tooltip: Bombers have their attack range area doubled.

Transmutation.tooltip: All active allied troops are replaced with level 3 Imps.

Bunker.tooltip: Increases the attack speed of your towers by 50%.

Feast.tooltip: Doubles the maximum HP of all troops.

Overwork.tooltip: Your buildings apply their effects one more time.

Eyeglass.tooltip: All your units and towers have +20% chance to deal critical damage.

Sharp Blades.tooltip: Increases the attack of all your units and towers by 30%.

Catharsis.tooltip: All troops in the field now have the same damage as your highest damage troop.

Supplies.tooltip: Get a copy of each of your king's cards.

Leatherworks.tooltip: Doubles the movement speed of all your units.

Gunpowder.tooltip: Increases the damaging range of area attacks by 30%.

Weakspot.tooltip: Frozen, stunned, or poisoned units take +50% damage.

Poison Thorns.tooltip: Every time enemies attack your units, those enemies gain 1 poison stack.

Venom.tooltip: Every poison effect is now applied twice.

Insurance.tooltip: Receive 1 gold for every 9 allied unit deaths.

Bargain.tooltip: Merchant's cards cost half the price.

Salvage.tooltip: Cards thrown into the pit return 3x more gold.

Burglary.tooltip: All active troops gain 2 stacks of Midas Touch.

Scimitars.tooltip: Thief attacks are always critical strikes.

Nettle.tooltip: Your Treant attack now deals damage to enemies.

Wilderness.tooltip: Unlocks 3 new random plots, with Forests on each of them.

Populate.tooltip: Whenever any unit is added to any plot, add one extra unit.

Gentrify.tooltip: All currently active plots gain one level.

Splicing.tooltip: The level of all active Lab Rats is doubled.

Ultragravity.tooltip: Doubles the attack range of your Mothership.

Frankensteinian.tooltip: Converter towers now summon Bombers instead of Lab Rats.

Scopes.tooltip: Adds 9 Precision cards to your hand.

Gambling.tooltip: Receive two cards after every battle. You can no longer choose your loot.

Longtermism.tooltip: You can choose three decrees in the next Royal Council.

Wishing well.tooltip: Gets 3 copies of the next card you throw into the pit.

Refraction.tooltip: Replaces your cards in hand with random Rainbow cards.

Payroll.tooltip: Your first re-roll in every encounter gives you +10 gold instead of taking it.

Static Fields.tooltip: Doubles the attack speed of your Citadel's lightning bolts.

Re-enchant.tooltip: Doubles all enchantments of all your active troops.

Glass Staffs.tooltip: Your Wizards now have 100 attack points but only 1 HP.

Abracadabra.tooltip: 10% of all enemies turn into frogs.

Spiremania.tooltip: Doubles the amount of healing rays of your Spires.

Towerdome.tooltip: Stronghold can now build towers twice as fast.
